about_the_game:
Help intrepid explorer Maya Robinson investigate a set of ancient cube-like artifacts buried deep in the jungle!

When you send a 4-digit signal to the Mystery Box, it will transform it according to a set of secret rules.

  • Sending 1234 to the box might give you 8642.

  • Sending another number, like 2244, gives you a different code like 8844.

  • Through experimentation and deduction, you can figure out the rules: in this case, double each digit and flip the number backwards.

Seems simple enough, right? But there's a catch: each box has multiple rules! The box takes the result of the first rule and applies a second rule to it. Can you find the patterns and use them to activate the boxes? As you progress, boxes will have more rules of increasing complexity.

As you explore and solve puzzles, you'll visit a fiery volcano, an abandoned crypt, a secret ice shrine, and more exciting locations! You'll also unlock fun color themes, as well as a variety of fancy outfits for Maya!

Maya is also happy to assist you as you solve the puzzles. She'll give you assistance with more challenging rules, give you ideas of possible solutions, and offer you tips and advice. If you get stumped, don't be afraid to ask her for a hint!

  • Randomly generated puzzles: you'll never run out of new boxes to solve!

  • 36 levels of difficulty, from basic to beyond insane!

  • Share puzzles with friends and challenge them to beat your score!

  • Customize Maya and your interface with fun cosmetic upgrades!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 15+
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Graphics: Apple M1

name: Mystery Boxes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Graphics: DX10+

short_description: Help Maya uncover the secrets of ancient artifacts in this challenging puzzle game! One code goes into the box, another comes out. Can you figure out what's happening inside the Mystery Boxes?
